sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Chat } from '../models/chat'; import { WorkshopService } from '../workshop.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-workshop-messages', templateUrl: './workshop-messages.component.html', styleUrls: ['./workshop-messages.component.css'] }) export class WorkshopMessagesComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private workshopService: WorkshopService, private router: Router, private route : ActivatedRoute) { this.workshopId = +this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('workshopId'); workshopService.getChatsByWorkshop(this.workshopId).subscribe((resp)=>{ this.chats = resp as Chat[]; }) } workshopId : number; chats: Chat[]; ngOnInit(): void { } }
